column13: - [Calculations for tissue specificity of genechip human GSE7307](https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4028700.v3) from [RefEx \(Reference Expression dataset\)](https://refex.dbcls.jp/)
column14: Tissue specificity matrices for 34 organ samples in the original gene expression data ([GSE7307](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE7307)) were calculated by the ROKU method [(Kadota et al, BMC Bioinformatics, 2006, 7:294)](https://doi.org/10.1186/1471-2105-7-294).  オリジナルの遺伝子発現データ([GSE7307](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE7307))に含まれる34臓器のサンプルに対して組織特異性行列をROKU法[(Kadota et al., BMC Bioinformatics, 2006, 7:294)](https://doi.org/10.1186/1471-2105-7-294)によって計算した結果です。
column15: Tissues in which a gene was tissue-specific highly expressed in 34 tissues of RefEx(GeneChip microarray). Tissue specificity matrices for 34 organ samples in the original gene expression data (GSE7307) were calculated by the ROKU method.

column4: Tissues in which a gene is tissue-specific highly expressed in 49 tissues of GTEx V6
column6: 組織特異的高発現遺伝子(GTEx)
column11: Sourceから考えるとbioRxivあるいは著者のライセンス？ またSupplementary Table 1→Table S1でしょうか？ GTEx自体がNIHのプロジェクトのようなので、いずれデータはNCBIポリシーになるはず
column13: Supplementary Table 1 of [A systematic survey of human tissue\-specific gene expression and splicing reveals new opportunities for therapeutic target identification and evaluation](https://doi.org/10.1101/311563); R. Y. Yang et al.; bioRxiv 311563
column14: - In 49 tissues of GTEx V6, a gene whose expression level in the target tissue is eight times higher than the weighted average expression level of the rest of the tissues is defined as a tissue-specific highly expressed gene. Mapping from tissue names to the corresponding [Uberon](https://uberon.github.io/about.html) or [Experimental Factor Ontology \(EFO\)] term is based on [GTEx documentation (Tissue Sampling Sites)](https://gtexportal.org/home/samplingSitePage).  - GTExの49組織において、対象組織での発現量が他の組織の加重平均発現量の8倍である遺伝子を組織特異的高発現遺伝子と定義しています。組織名から対応する[Uberon](https://uberon.github.io/about.html)または[Experimental Factor Ontology \(EFO\)](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/index.html)タームへのマッピングは、[GTExのTissue Sampling Sites](https://gtexportal.org/home/samplingSitePage)の記載に基づいています。
column15: Tissues in which a gene is tissue-specific highly expressed in GTEx. In 49 tissues of GTEx V6, a gene whose expression level in the target tissue is eight times higher than the weighted average expression level of the rest of the tissues is defined as a tissue-specific highly expressed gene.

column14: - Tissues in which the gene with zero TPM expression was detected among 53 tissues of GTEx are shown. Mapping from tissue names to the corresponding [Uberon](https://uberon.github.io/about.html) or [Experimental Factor Ontology \(EFO\)] term is based on [GTEx documentation (Tissue Sampling Sites)](https://gtexportal.org/home/samplingSitePage).  - GTExの53組織中で、TPM発現量が0であった遺伝子が検出された組織を表示しています。組織名から対応する[Uberon](https://uberon.github.io/about.html)または[Experimental Factor Ontology \(EFO\)](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/index.html)タームへのマッピングは、[GTExのTissue Sampling Sites](https://gtexportal.org/home/samplingSitePage)の記載に基づいています。
column15: Tissues in which expression of a gene is not detected in 53 tissues of GTEx. Tissues in which the gene with zero TPM expression was detected among 53 tissues of GTEx V8 are shown.

In some cases, 3D structures of the same protein have been obtained under different conditions. UniprotのうちPDBに立体構造のデータがあるもの。立体構造が登録されているタンパクは全体に比べるとわずか。また、同じタンパクでも異なる条件で立体構造を取得されている場合がある

column4: Rate of helical regions in each entry of UniProt
column6: 立体構造に含まれるαへリックスの数
column13: Helix entities counted in each entry of PDB（の中のどのデータ？） →PDBのエントリーに紐づいている"Helix"というEntityの数を数えています。
column14: - Number of alpha-helices in a PDB entry. The alpha helix is one of the basic three-dimensional structures, consisting of 3.6 residues forming a "one-helix" structure. - 立体構造に含まれるαへリックスの数。αへリックスは基本的な立体構造の１つ。3.6残基で”1螺旋”を作っている構造。
column15: Number of 'Helix' entities counted in each entry of PDB

column4: Rate of beta strand regions in each entry of UniProt
column6: 立体構造に含まれるβシートの数
column13: Sheet entities counted in each entry of PDB（の中のどのデータ？） →同上でこちらは"Sheet"Entityの数です
column14: - Number of beta-sheets in a PDB entry. Beta sheet is one of the basic three-dimensional structures. It creates a planar structure. - 立体構造に含まれるβシートの数。βシートは基本的な立体構造の１つ。平面状の構造をつくる。
column15: Number of 'Sheet' entities counted in each entry of PDB

column4: The number of peptides in a PDB entry
column6: 立体構造の中含まれるペプチド鎖の数。複合体などで２以上となる
column14: - Number of peptides in a PDB entry. In the case of complexes, it is two or more.2 or more in complexes, etc. - 立体構造の中含まれるペプチド鎖の数。複合体などで２以上となる
column15: Number of peptides in each entry of PDB

column4: Classification by the method used to determine the three-dimensional structure in Experimental method section from PDB
column6: 立体構造を決定するのに用いた方法。クライオ電顕など
column14: Classification by the method used to determine the three-dimensional structure, including basic X-ray crystal diffraction, cryo-electric microscopy (no crystalization required) and others  立体構造を決定するのに用いた方法。基本はX線結晶回析だが、クライオ電顕など結晶作成を伴わない解析方法もある
column15: Classification by the method used to determine the three-dimensional structure in Experimental method section from PDB

column4: Proteins participating as components classified by pathway (reaction) from Reactome
column6: 各reactome pathwayに参加するタンパク質
column11: データは Creative Commons Public Domain (CC0) License https://reactome.org/license
column14: Proteins participating as components classified by pathway (reaction). If a compound and a protein are included in the same pathway, the relationship between them can be traced. componentとして参加しているタンパク質をpathway（reaction）ごとに分類。同じpathwayに化合物とタンパク質が含まれていれば関連性がたどれる
column15: Proteins participating as components classified by pathway (reaction) from Reactome

column4: Compounds participating as components classified by pathway (reaction) from Reactome
column6: 各reactome pathwayに参加する化合物 (ChEBI)
column11: データは Creative Commons Public Domain (CC0) License https://reactome.org/license
column14: Compounds participating as components classified by pathway (reaction). If a compound and a protein are included in the same pathway, the relationship between them can be traced. componentとして参加している化合物をpathway（reaction）ごとに分類。同じpathwayに化合物とタンパク質が含まれていれば関連性がたどれる
column15: Compounds participating as components classified by pathway (reaction) from Reactome

column4: Classification of uniprot proteins by the number of target proteins they interact with in Interaction section from UniProt
column6: 各uniprotタンパク質を相互作用するターゲットタンパク質の数で分類
column14: - Classification of uniprot proteins by the number of target proteins they interact with It does not provide information about the target proteins themselves. - Uniprotタンパク質を、相互作用するターゲットタンパク質数で分類。ターゲットタンパク質自体の情報が得られる訳ではない。
column15: Classification of uniprot proteins by the number of target proteins they interact with in Interaction section from UniProt

column4: Uniprot entries classified according to the presence or absence of a method to detect direct protein-compound interactions (ChEMBL assay)
column6: 全uniprotタンパク質に対するChEMBL assayの有無
column7: Target protein from ChEMBL-RDF against all UniProt entries
column13: Target protein from ChEMBL-RDF 28.0 against all UniProt entries
column14: - Uniprot entries classified according to the presence or absence of a method to detect direct protein-compound interactions (chembl assay). If a detection method is available, the direct association between the compound (chembl) and the protein can be traced. - 全てのUniprotエントリーに対して、タンパク質と化合物の直接の相互作用を検出する方法（chembl assay）の有無で分類。検出方法があれば、化合物(chembl)とタンパク質の直接の関連性がたどれる
column15: Uniprot entries classified according to the presence or absence of a method to detect direct protein-compound interactions (ChEMBL assay)

column4: Classification based on the chemical roles, such as antioxidant or environmental contaminant from ChEBI
column6: 化合物の化学的役割による分類
column14: - Classification based on the chemical roles, such as antioxidant or environmental contaminant from ChEBI. - 化合物（in ChEBI）の化学的役割（抗酸化剤、環境汚染物質、リガンド等）による分類です。
column15: Classification based on the chemical roles, such as antioxidant or environmental contaminant from ChEBI

column4: Classification based on the application types, such as pharmaceutical or pesticide from ChEBI
column6: 化合物の適用種別による分類
column14: - Classification based on the application types, such as pharmaceutical or pesticide from ChEBI. - 化合物（in ChEBI）の適用種別（薬、農薬、毒物、食品添加物等）による分類です。
column15: Classification based on the application types, such as pharmaceutical or pesticide from ChEBI

column4: Classification based on the mechanism of action, such as an inhibitor or an antagonist from ChEMBL
column6: inhibitorやantagonistといった化合物の作用機作による分類
column14: - Classification based on the mechanism of action, such as an inhibitor or an antagonist. - inhibitorやantagonistといった作用機作による分類です。
column15: Classification based on the mechanism of action, such as an inhibitor or an antagonist from ChEMBL

column4: Classification based on the biological roles, such as inhibitor or antimicrobial agent from ChEBI
column6: 化合物の生物学的役割による分類
column14: - Classification based on the biological roles, such as inhibitor or antimicrobial agent from ChEBI. - 化合物（in ChEBI）の生物学的役割（阻害剤、抗菌剤等）による分類です。
column15: Classification based on the biological roles, such as inhibitor or antimicrobial agent from ChEBI

column4: Classification of diseases for which drugs are indicated, based on hierarchical data using MeSH, a life science thesaurus from ChEMBL
column6: 薬の適応疾患（MeSH分類）
column14: - Classification of diseases for which drugs are indicated, based on hierarchical data using MeSH, a life science thesaurus. - 薬が適応している疾患について、生命科学用語集（シソーラス）であるMeSHを用いた階層データによる分類です。
column15: Classification of diseases for which drugs are indicated, based on hierarchical data using MeSH, a life science thesaurus from ChEMBL

column4: Classification based on the drug's development phase (research stage, phase I-III, and post-launch) from ChEMBL
column6: 薬の開発フェーズによる化合物分類
column14: Classification based on the drug's development phase (research stage, phase I-III, and post-launch). - 薬の開発フェーズ（研究段階、フェーズI～III、上市後）による分類です。
column15: Classification based on the drug's development phase (research stage, phase I-III, and post-launch) from ChEMBL

column4: Classification of a medicine (in PubChem) according to its medicinal properties (WHO ATC Code)
column6: PubChem の薬を薬効（WHO ATC Code）で分類
column11: ATC NCBOで”Public"とされている。WHOの成果らしいので、問題ないと推測。  PubChem an open access database, You may use downloaded PubChem data however you wish. https://pubchemdocs.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/0downloads
column14: - Classification of a medicine (in PubChem) according to its medicinal properties (WHO ATC Code). - 薬効（WHO ATC Code）による薬 (PubChem) の分類です。
column15: Classification of a medicine (in PubChem) according to its medicinal properties (WHO ATC Code)

column4: Classification of a medicine (in ChEMBL) according to its medicinal properties (WHO ATC Code)
column6: ChEMBL の薬を薬効（WHO ATC Code）で分類、対応する疾患名をBioPortal上のATCオントロジーからとっている
column14: - Classification of a medicine (in ChEMBL) according to its medicinal properties (WHO ATC Code). - 薬効（WHO ATC Code）による薬 (ChEMBL) の分類です。
column15: Classification of a medicine (in ChEMBL) according to its medicinal properties (WHO ATC Code)

column4: Molecular weight of glycans from GlyCosmos
column6: GlyCosmosの中のどのデータを取ってきているのか？ Monoisotopic mass関連はGlyCosmos Glycans
column15: Molecular weight of glycans from GlyCosmos

column4: Tissues where glycans are expressed
column6: GlyCosmosの中のどのデータを取ってきているのか？ DLページでTissue関連はGlyCosmos Glycans
column15: Tissues where glycans are expressed

column4: The relationship between four levels of glycan types registered in GlyCosmos. For details, see the Help page of GlyCosmos.
column6: GlyCosmosの中のどのデータを取ってきているのか？ HelpPageリンク切れ DLページでSubsumption関連はGlyCosmos Glycans
column15: The relationship between four levels of glycan types registered in GlyCosmos. For details, see the Help page of GlyCosmos.

column4: Subcategories in the Disease or disorder category in the Mondo Disease Ontology (Mondo)
column6: MONDOの疾患分類の階層表示
column14: - Classification based on the hierarchical data of the disease/disorder (MONDO:0000001) category in Mondo, which is a comprehensive vocabulary collectionlexical data of disease names. For example, please refer to "disease by anatomical system" below for classification by body part. - 網羅的に疾患名を集めた語彙データであるMondoにおける疾患・障害（MONDO:0000001）カテゴリーの階層データによる分類です。例えば、身体的部位別の分類は”disease by anatomical system”以下を参照して下さい。
column15: Classification based on the hierarchical data of the disease/disorder (MONDO:0000001) category in Mondo, which is a comprehensive vocabulary collectionlexical data of disease names.

column4: Subcategories in the Disease category in Medical Subject Headings (MeSH)
column6: MeSHの疾患分類の階層表示
column11: NLM freely provides MeSH data.（ちょっと意味が違う気がしますが） https://www.nlm.nih.gov/databases/download/terms_and_conditions_mesh.html
column14: - Classification based on the hierarchical data of diseases in MeSH, a thesaurus of life science terms. For example, if you want to narrow down your search by tumor, see hierarchies below "Neoplasms". - 生命科学用語集（シソーラス）であるMeSHのうち疾患に関する階層データによる分類です。例えば、腫瘍で絞り込みたい場合には、”Neoplasms"以下を参照して下さい。
column15: Classification based on the hierarchical data of diseases in MeSH, a thesaurus of life science terms.

column4: Japanese rare and intractable disease categories in the Nanbyo Disease Ontology (NANDO)
column6: 希少難病疾患及び、小児慢性特定疾患の分類階層データ
column14: - Classification of rare and intractable diseases (designated intractable diseases and chronic pediatric diseases) in Japan by NANDO, a vocabulary collection of disease names. It includes 333 designated intractable diseases and 764 pediatric chronic diseases, as well as subdivided disease names included in them. - 日本の希少難病疾患（指定難病疾患・小児慢性疾患）の疾患名の語彙集であるNANDOによる分類です。指定難病疾患333疾患及び、小児慢性疾患764疾患と更にそれらに含まれる細分化した疾患名を含みます。
column15: Classification of rare and intractable diseases (designated intractable diseases and chronic pediatric diseases) in Japan by NANDO.

column3: Cross referenced disease DBs in Mondo
column4: Number of entries linked to Mondo in each of approx. 70 disease related databases from database cross reference in Mondo
column6: MONDOオントロジーに登録されている疾患関連DBへのリンクの数
column14: -Classification by the name of disease DB with its number of entries linked to for each of the approximately 70 disease DBs associated with Mondo. Mondo, which is a comprehensive vocabulary collectionlexical data of disease names and associated. - 網羅的に疾患名を集めた語彙データであるMondoに関連づけられているおおよそ70の各疾患DBに対して、関連付けされた数をカウントしたデータです。どのDBに含まれている語彙かが分かると、疾患の特徴が分かることがあります。
column15: Classification of Mondo diseases by disease DBs linked to them. Mondo, which is a comprehensive vocabulary collectionlexical data of disease names and associated.

column4: Classification the subcategories of the Phenotypic abnormality categories of the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)
column6: 人の表現型異常に関する階層データによる分類の表示
column11: The HPO vocabularies, annotation files, tools and documentation are freely available. https://hpo.jax.org/app/license
column14: - Classification the subcategories of the Phenotypic abnormality (HP:0000118) category in HPO, a vocabulary collectionlexicon of human abnormal phenotypes (including disease names). - 人の異常表現型（疾患名を含む）語彙データであるHPOにおける、Phenotypic abnormality(HP:0000118)カテゴリーの階層データによる分類です。
column15: Classification based on the hierarchical data of the Phenotypic abnormality category  (HP:0000118) in HPO, a vocabulary collectionlexicon of human abnormal phenotypes (including disease names).

column4: Classification of statistically significant variants in genome-wide association studies (GWAS) based on associated traits. Obtained from GWAS catalog via TogoVar
column11: http://www.ebi.ac.uk/about/terms-of-use/ だが、3rdPartyの確認は必要そう
column14: - オリジナルデータ：All associations v1.0.2 - with added ontology annotations, GWAS Catalog study accession numbers and genotyping technology - オリジナルデータを取得したあと、川島さん作成コンバーターでRDFに変換しています。 - GWAS Catalogのデータのうち、togovar_id（例：tgv47264307)を持つバリアントのみが対象となります。togovar_idは日本人集団の頻度データが存在するバリアントのみに付与されています。
column15: Classification of statistically significant variants in genome-wide association studies (GWAS) based on associated traits. Obtained from GWAS catalog via TogoVar

column4: Classification of variants according to their clinical significance, such as whether they are the cause of the disease or not. Obtained from ClinVar via TogoVar
column6: ClinVarがバリアントに付与した臨床的意義による分類
column14: - Classification of variants according to their clinical significance, such as whether they are the cause of the disease or not. Obtained from ClinVar via TogoVar. - 疾患の原因であるかないかなどの臨床的意義(clinical significance)によるバリアントの分類です。 -オリジナルデータ：https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pub/clinvar/xml/clinvar_variation/ClinVarVariationRelease_00-latest.xml.gz - オリジナルデータを取得したあと、med2rdfプロジェクトで作成されたコンバーターでRDFに変換しています。 - Clinical significanceのデータのうち、togovar_id（例：tgv47264307)を持つバリアントのみが対象となります。togovar_idは日本人集団の頻度データが存在するバリアントのみに付与されています。
column15: Classification of variants according to their clinical significance, such as whether they are the cause of the disease or not. Obtained from ClinVar via TogoVar
